original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum kusalam dhammam paṭicca no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum akusalam dhammam paṭicca no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū

original: naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ
analyzed: na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūla
